MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 23-MAR-2021 14:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the DG11 postcode area of Lockerbie. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:00am to safely complete repairs on a damaged pole near Gibsons substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:39am on Tuesday, 23 March 2021
